about_the_game:
Are you ready to take an adventure with an alligator and a fox inside a transforming monster truck? Does the alligator even have a driving license? The destination is unknown, but Rallygator will surely reach it!

In this physics-based platformer game, you control a multi-functional, transforming monster truck. Solve puzzles and perform tricky stunts.

Hop and drive around in car mode, dive into the deep waters in submarine mode, or turn into a mini-truck to navigate tight spaces. Rallygator is full of surprises!

Features


Ever-changing and challenging gameplay
Physics-driven gameplay, including character animations
Adorable cartoon graphics
Support for both controller and keyboard play."
detailed_description:
Are you ready to take an adventure with an alligator and a fox inside a transforming monster truck? Does the alligator even have a driving license? The destination is unknown, but Rallygator will surely reach it!

In this physics-based platformer game, you control a multi-functional, transforming monster truck. Solve puzzles and perform tricky stunts.

Hop and drive around in car mode, dive into the deep waters in submarine mode, or turn into a mini-truck to navigate tight spaces. Rallygator is full of surprises!

Features


Ever-changing and challenging gameplay
Physics-driven gameplay, including character animations
Adorable cartoon graphics
Support for both controller and keyboard play."
name: Rallygator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32-64bit versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: +2 GHZ dual core processor
  • Graphics: Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 TI or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Rallygator is a physics-based platformer game where you control a multi-functional, ever-transforming monster truck. Tackle clever puzzles and perform tricky stunts along the way!
